code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{Headings,Paragraph,Sections,Button,Main}from"components";import{useActiveSection}from"hooks";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{GeneralContent}from"content";import{ScrollToTop}from"utils";import{useProjects}from"context/ProjectContext";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectPage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const{buttons}=GeneralContent;const{backButton}=buttons;const testId="project";const sectionIds=["".concat(testId,"-content")];const activeSection=useActiveSection(sectionIds);const{projects}=useProjects();const projectId=Number(id);const singleProject=projects===null||projects===void 0?void 0:projects.find(project=>project.id===projectId);useEffect(()=>{ScrollToTop();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Main,{testId:testId,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Sections,{flex:"column",align:"center",justify:"start",id:"".concat(testId,"-content"),isVisible:activeSection==="".concat(testId,"-content"),children:[singleProject?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Headings,{title:singleProject.title.rendered,type:"h1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paragraph,{content:singleProject.content,proportion:"full",isPost:true})]}):"No project selected",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{content:backButton})]})});};export{ProjectPage};
